short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the Hacker News social news site easy on the eyes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reduce cognitive load, assist visual parsing and improve page navigation of your favorite social news site.

The information density for which Hacker News is known is preserved, along with the conservative brand. A few minor enhancements:

• Follow every comment and thread, up and down, by clicking the row
• Maximum page width is reduced to 700 pixels
• Table background matches page background
• Redundant prefixes are removed (Ask HN, Show HN)
• Increased padding for presentation and action elements
• Dynamic visual row highlighting
